mean_en: to cause (someone) to stop thinking about or paying attention to someone or something and to think about or pay attention to someone or something else instead
sentence: The cat tried to distract his friend\u0027s attention and took his fish.
sentence_trans: 小猫试图转移他朋友的注意力，伺机拿走他的小鱼干。
word_etyma: dis分开，分离 + tract拉 → 把心拉开 → 分心
